channel.title: how do you load BMS maps into hammer?
channel.description:
i've been looking around the folder that contains all of the mod assets but i cant find the VMF files for the maps. i was hoping to mess around with models to create custom maps for a SFM project i had in mind
any help is aprechiated

item.title: how do you load BMS maps into hammer?
item.dc:creator: That_One_Doctor
item.description:
Here you go, it decompiles .bsp files into .vmf files. Hope I helped.
https://ata4.info/bspsrc/downloads.html

Read full topic
item.source: how do you load BMS maps into hammer?
